argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | assamulgscm.v | |- V = ( Base ` W ) |

| 3 |  | assamulgscm.b | |- B = ( Base ` F ) |
| 4 |  | assamulgscm.s | |- .x. = ( .s ` W ) |
| 5 |  | assamulgscm.g | |- G = ( mulGrp ` F ) |
| 6 |  | assamulgscm.p | |- .^ = ( .g ` G ) |

| 8 |  | assamulgscm.e | |- E = ( .g ` H ) |

| 10 |  | #P_assaring | |- ( W e. AssAlg -> W e. Ring ) |
| 11 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 1r ` W ) = ( 1r ` W ) |
| 12 | 1, 11 | #P_ringidcl | |- ( W e. Ring -> ( 1r ` W ) e. V ) |

| 18 | 17 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( ( A e. B /\ X e. V ) /\ W e. AssAlg ) -> ( 1r ` W ) = ( ( 1r ` F ) .x. ( 1r ` W ) ) ) |
| 19 | 9 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( ( A e. B /\ X e. V ) /\ W e. AssAlg ) -> W e. LMod ) |

| 21 |  | #P_simplr | |- ( ( ( A e. B /\ X e. V ) /\ W e. AssAlg ) -> X e. V ) |

| 25 | 7, 11 | #P_ringidval | |- ( 1r ` W ) = ( 0g ` H ) |
| 26 | 24, 25, 8 | #P_mulg0 | |- ( ( A .x. X ) e. V -> ( 0 E ( A .x. X ) ) = ( 1r ` W ) ) |

| 29 | 5, 14 | #P_ringidval | |- ( 1r ` F ) = ( 0g ` G ) |

| 34 | 31, 33 | #P_oveq12d | |- ( ( ( A e. B /\ X e. V ) /\ W e. AssAlg ) -> ( ( 0 .^ A ) .x. ( 0 E X ) ) = ( ( 1r ` F ) .x. ( 1r ` W ) ) ) |
| 35 | 18, 27, 34 | #P_3eqtr4d | |- ( ( ( A e. B /\ X e. V ) /\ W e. AssAlg ) -> ( 0 E ( A .x. X ) ) = ( ( 0 .^ A ) .x. ( 0 E X ) ) ) |
